item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。随着 CPI 逼近，股市暂停，货币基金全力押注央行。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. Stocks take a pause as CPI looms into view and currency funds go all in on central bank bets. Here’s what traders are talking about.— David Goodman】

item.title: 企业撤回罗马尼亚投标，欧盟将关闭对中国太阳能的调查
item.description: 欧盟周一表示，将结束对中国公司竞标罗马尼亚太阳能园区的调查，因为这些公司正在退出竞标。【原文：The European Union said Monday that it will close probes into bids by Chinese firms for a Romanian solar park because the companies are pulling out of the tender.】

item.title: 新加坡候任总理黄教安在改组中与守旧派保持一致
item.description: 新加坡即将上任的总理黄遵宪挑选了贸易部长颜金勇作为副手，卸任总理李显龙的内阁基本保持不变。【原文：Singapore’s incoming Prime Minister Lawrence Wong picked Trade Minister Gan Kim Yong as his deputy, keeping the cabinet of outgoing premier Lee Hsien Loong largely intact.】

item.title: 德国建筑工人 17 年来首次罢工
item.description: 德国一些建筑工人正准备在本周举行罢工行动，这是他们 17 年来首次为争取更高的工资而罢工。【原文：Some construction workers in Germany are gearing up for strike action this week, the first time in 17 years they’ve walked off the job in a demand for better pay.】

item.title: 首席财务官称 Adnoc Drilling 正在审查更多收购目标
item.description: Adnoc Drilling Co.PJSC 计划今年进行更多收购，以帮助促进增长，目前正在审查中东地区的潜在目标。【原文：Adnoc Drilling Co. PJSC plans to make even more acquisitions this year to help boost growth and is currently reviewing potential targets in the Middle East.】

item.title: 土耳其大选月神秘资金外流近 100 亿美元
item.description: 在选民投票的一个月里，土耳其不明原因的资金外流再次激增，重演了一年前全国大选前的资金外流。【原文：Unexplained outflows of capital from Turkey surged again during a month when voters went to the polls, a repeat of the money drain it suffered in the run-up to national elections a year ago.】

item.title: 肯尼亚最大银行称坏账达到顶峰，预计年底前将有所减少
item.description: Equity Group Holdings Plc 首席执行官 James Mwangi 表示，随着肯尼亚本土市场业务的复苏，预计最后一个季度的不良贷款将有所下降。【原文：Equity Group Holdings Plc expects non-performing loans will decline in the final quarter as businesses in its home market of Kenya recover, according Chief Executive Officer James Mwangi.】

item.title: 中国调查产品收益达 795%、持有人失踪的对冲基金
item.description: 在一家对冲基金公司停止向投资者还款后，中国正在对该公司进行调查，这也是继对 5.5 万亿元人民币（约合 7,600 亿美元）的对冲基金行业加强审查后的又一举措。【原文：China is probing a hedge fund firm with stellar returns after it stopped repaying investors, following tightening scrutiny on the 5.5 trillion yuan ($760 billion) industry.】

item.title: 印度将与伊朗签署港口协议以扩大中亚贸易
item.description: 在印度寻求扩大中亚贸易之际，印度有望与伊朗签署一项长期协议，在具有战略意义的恰巴哈尔港（Chabahar）运营一个码头。【原文：India is expected to sign a long-term agreement to operate a terminal at the strategic Chabahar port with Iran as it seeks to expand trade in Central Asia.】

item.title: 捷克通胀反弹，对利率的谨慎立场得到加强
item.description: 捷克通胀率在第一季度达到央行目标后，上个月的反弹幅度超过预期，这为采取更加谨慎的货币宽松政策提供了支持。【原文：Czech inflation rebounded more than expected last month after it reached the central bank’s target in the first quarter, bolstering the case for a more cautious approach to monetary easing.】

item.description: 大和证券集团公司（Daiwa Securities Group Inc.【原文：Daiwa Securities Group Inc. will take a stake in Aozora Bank Ltd., giving the bank access to fresh capital after it posted losses.】

item.title: 基金在央行大戏的推动下全力投入货币交易
item.description: 美联储在降息计划上后退，日本在支撑日元，英国央行行长意见不一，瑞典和瑞士已经在放松货币政策。【原文：The Federal Reserve is backpedaling on plans to cut interest rates, Japan is propping up the yen, British central bankers are divided, and Sweden and Switzerland are already loosening monetary policy.】

item.title: Blackstone 通过管理层收购将日本药物试验公司私有化
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 正与 I'rom Group Co. 的管理层合作，将这家日本制药服务公司私有化。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is working with the management of I’rom Group Co. to take the Japanese pharmaceutical services company private.】

item.title: 外资暂停日本债券期货跌势，但前景看跌
item.description: 外国投资者成为日本国债期货的净买方，停止了有记录以来最长的抛售狂潮，但这不太可能预示着情绪的好转。【原文：Foreign investors became net buyers of Japanese government bond futures, putting a stop to their longest selling spree on record, but this is unlikely to signal a turnaround in sentiment.】

item.title: 主要农作物贸易商竞相争夺澳大利亚棉花王冠
item.description: 全球最大的两家农作物贸易商正在争相收购澳大利亚最大的棉花加工商，希望借此加强其供应来源，并靠近亚洲的全球主要买家。【原文：Two of the world’s biggest crop traders are battling to acquire Australia’s largest cotton processor, hoping to strengthen their sources of supply and presence close to major global buyers in Asia.】

item.title: EQT 提议以 15 亿美元收购风能开发商 OX2
item.description: EQT AB 正寻求将瑞典最大的风力发电场开发商之一私有化，以增强其绿色雄心。【原文：EQT AB is bolstering its green ambitions by seeking to take one of Sweden’s largest wind park developers private.】

item.title: 降息呼声高涨，菲律宾比索创亚洲最大跌幅
item.description: 菲律宾比索是亚洲跌幅最大的货币，原因是上周公布的经济增长数据疲软，导致降息预期升温。【原文：The Philippine peso fell the most in Asia as expectations for an interest-rate cut mounted following the release of weak economic growth data last week.】

item.title: 日本央行在多元化方面后退，高管全部为男性
item.description: 在促进性别平等方面，日本央行进一步落后于全球同行，因为在调整高级职位后，日本央行又恢复了全男性执行董事的阵容。【原文：The Bank of Japan fell further behind its global peers on efforts to promote gender equality as it returned to an all male lineup of executive directors after reshuffling its senior positions.】

item.title: 印度回购计划与印度央行保持紧缩立场的需要相冲突
item.description: 印度利用剩余现金回购债券的举措没有达到预期，因为印度央行似乎不愿意向买家提供较低的收益率，以免被视为转向宽松货币政策。【原文：India’s move to buyback bonds using up surplus cash has fallen short of expectations as the central bank seems unwilling to offer lower yields to buyers lest it is seen as a pivot toward monetary easing.】

item.title: 非洲最大运营商沃达康全年派息低于预期
item.description: 非洲最大的无线运营商沃达康集团（Vodacom Group Ltd.）宣布的全年股息低于预期，尽管收入和营业利润增长了 20% 以上。【原文：Vodacom Group Ltd., Africa’s largest wireless carrier, declared a full-year dividend that missed estimates even as revenue and operating profit grew by more than 20%.】

item.description: 罗马尼亚即将在三年内首次降低借贷成本，但对欧盟最高通胀率的担忧可能意味着投资者需要再等一段时间。【原文：Romania is on the cusp of lowering borrowing costs for the first time in three years, but concerns over the European Union’s highest inflation rate may mean investors will have to wait a little longer.】

item.title: 电动汽车需求放缓，铂金短缺问题将持续存在
item.description: 据世界铂金投资委员会称，由于电动汽车热潮的放缓支撑了对汽车催化剂的需求，今年铂金市场仍将处于赤字状态。【原文：The platinum market will remain in a deficit this year as a slowdown in the electric-vehicle boom supports demand for autocatalysts, according to the World Platinum Investment Council.】

item.title: 据说 Starwood 领导的集团将考虑收购价值 54 亿美元的 ESR
item.description: 据知情人士透露，由喜达屋资本集团（Starwood Capital Group）等投资者牵头的一个财团正在考虑收购亚洲仓库开发商 ESR 集团有限公司。【原文：A consortium led by investors including Starwood Capital Group is considering a buyout of Asian warehouse developer ESR Group Ltd., according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 捷豹所有者塔塔汽车因销售前景黯淡而股价下跌
item.description: 印度汽车制造商塔塔汽车公司（Tata Motors Ltd.）因销售前景不佳，股价创下两年多来最大跌幅，该公司旗下拥有豪华 SUV 品牌捷豹路虎。【原文：Shares of Indian carmaker Tata Motors Ltd., which owns the luxury SUV brand Jaguar Land Rover, slumped the most in more than two years on weak sales outlook.】

item.title: 阵亡将士纪念日公路旅行人数在后科维德热潮中创下新高
item.description: 据美国汽车协会（American Automobile Association）称，今年阵亡将士纪念日周末，美国将有约 3840 万人上路，是二十多年来追踪该节日出行数据最多的一次。【原文：About 38.4 million people will take to the roads this Memorial Day weekend in the US, the most in more than two decades of data tracking the holiday’s travel numbers, according to the American Automobile Association.】
